data.name: BundleTypeMissingExceptionMessage
data.value: You must specify exactly one of: {0}.

data.name: InvalidInputVersionExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: The specified version is not valid: "{0}".

data.name: OperatingSystemNotSupportedExceptionMessage
data.value: This command is not supported on this operating system.

data.name: ListCommandDescription
data.value: List .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that can be removed with this tool.

data.name: ListCommandRuntimeHeader
data.value: .NET Core Runtimes:

data.name: ListCommandSdkHeader
data.value: .NET Core SDKs:

data.name: OptionsConflictExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: You must specify only one of the options: {0}.

data.name: RequiredArgMissingForUninstallCommandExceptionMessage
data.value: Required argument missing for the uninstall command.

data.name: UninstallRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core Runtimes only.

data.name: UninstallSdkOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs only.

data.name: SpecifiedVersionNotFoundExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: The specified version is not found: "{0}".

data.name: UninstallAllBelowOptionArgumentName
data.value: VERSION

data.name: UninstallAllBelowOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes below the specified version. The specified version will remain.

data.name: UninstallAllButLatestOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes, except the one highest version.

data.name: UninstallAllButOptionArgumentName
data.value: VERSIONS

data.name: UninstallAllButOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes, except those specified.

data.name: UninstallAllLowerPatchesOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that have been superceded by higher patches.

data.name: UninstallAllOptionDescription
data.value: Remove all .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.

data.name: UninstallAllPreviewsButLatestOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that are marked as previews, except the one highest preview.

data.name: UninstallAllPreviewsOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that are marked as previews.

data.name: UninstallationFailedExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: Timeout during uninstall: {0}.

data.name: UninstallationFailedExceptionWithExitCodeMessageFormat
data.value: The uninstallation operation failed. Exit code was {1} for "{0}".

data.name: UninstallMajorMinorOptionArgumentName
data.value: MAJOR_MINOR

data.name: UninstallMajorMinorOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes that match the specified `major.minor` version.

data.name: UninstallNoOptionArgumentDescription
data.value: The specified version to uninstall.

data.name: UninstallNoOptionArgumentName
data.value: VERSION

data.name: UninstallNoOptionDescription
data.value: Remove specified .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes. This tool can only uninstall items that were installed using .NET Core SDK or Runtime installers.

data.name: VerbosityOptionArgumentName
data.value: LEVEL

data.name: VerbosityOptionDescription
data.value: Set the verbosity level. Allowed values are q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], d[etailed], and diag[nostic].

data.name: UninstallX64OptionDescription
data.value: Can be used with --sdk, --runtime and --aspnet-runtime to remove x64.

data.name: UninstallX86OptionDescription
data.value: Can be used with --sdk, --runtime and --aspnet-runtime to remove x86.

data.name: NotAdminExceptionMessage
data.value: The current user does not have adequate privileges. See https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-uninstall.

data.name: MoreThanOneVersionSpecifiedExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: You must specify exactly one version for option: {0}.

data.name: MoreThanZeroVersionSpecifiedExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: You cannot specify a version for option: {0}.

data.name: VersionBeforeOptionExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: Do not use a version before an option: {0}.

data.name: VerbosityLevelInvalidExceptionMessage
data.value: Allowed verbosity levels are q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], d[etailed], and diag[nostic].

data.name: UninstallNormalVerbosityFormat
data.value: Uninstalling: {0}.

data.name: DoItOptionDescription
data.value: Actually uninstall specified .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.

data.name: DryRunBundleFormat
data.value: Would uninstall: {0}.

data.name: DryRunEndMessage
data.value: *** END DRY RUN

data.name: DryRunHowToDoItMessageFormat
data.value: To actually uninstall, add --do-it: {0} --do-it.

data.name: DryRunStartMessage
data.value: *** DRY RUN

data.name: MacOsBundleDisplayNameFormat
data.value: Microsoft .NET Core {0} {1} (x64)

data.name: CancelingMessage
data.value: Canceling: waiting for the current uninstall to complete.

data.name: UninstallAspNetRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: Remove ASP.NET Core Runtimes only.

data.name: ListCommandAspNetRuntimeHeader
data.value: ASP.NET Core Runtimes:

data.name: UninstallHostingBundleOptionDescription
data.value: Remove .NET Core Runtime & Hosting Bundles only.

data.name: ListCommandHostingBundleHeader
data.value: .NET Core Runtime & Hosting Bundles:

data.name: HostingBundleFootnoteFormat
data.value: "{0}" is treated as a version {1} in this tool.

data.name: ListAspNetRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: List ASP.NET Core Runtimes.

data.name: ListHostingBundleOptionDescription
data.value: List .NET Core Runtime & Hosting Bundles.

data.name: ListRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: List .NET Core Runtimes.

data.name: ListSdkOptionDescription
data.value: List .NET Core SDKs.

data.name: ListX64OptionDescription
data.value: List x64 .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.

data.name: ListX86OptionDescription
data.value: List x86 .NET Core SDKs or Runtimes.
